card_left.heading: API Tokens
card_left.description: Create or manage tokens so that you can access the API

ctas.accountRestrictedText: You are unable to create new tokens when your account is blocked. Please contact support@web3.storage

card_center.heading: Read the docs
card_center.description: See the docs for guides and walkthroughs

card_right.description: Files can also be uploaded directly using this web interface, as an alternative to using the API

ctas.accountRestrictedText: You are unable to upload files when your account is blocked. Please contact support@web3.storage

storage_manager.heading: Storage
storage_manager.tooltip_total: This is the total of all your uploads, including ones marked "Failed" (you can read more about what the status means here). You can remove uploads via the table below.

upload.accountRestrictedText: You are unable to upload files when your account is blocked. Please contact support@web3.storage

table.message: You don't have any files uploaded yet.

cta.accountRestrictedText: You are unable to upload files when your account is blocked. Please contact support@web3.storage

table.pins_message: You don't have any files pinned yet.

cid.label: CID
cid.tooltip: The content identifier for a file or a piece of data. Learn more

requestid.label: Request ID
requestid.tooltip: The identifier for this pin request. Learn more

tooltip.header: Indicates whether web3.storage received a complete graph of data (e.g., a full file). "Complete" indicates that web3.storage has successfully received your entire upload. If you intentionally uploaded an incomplete graph, ignore this column.
tooltip.pin_queued: The upload has been received and is in the queue to be pinned.
tooltip.pinning: The upload is being replicated to multiple IPFS nodes.
tooltip.pinned: The upload is fully pinned on *numberOfPins* IPFS nodes.

tooltip.header: Filecoin storage providers provably storing redundant replicas of this data. Learn more
tooltip.queuing:
The content from this upload is being aggregated for redundant storage on Filecoin.
Filecoin deals will be active within 48 hours of upload.
While Queuing, data is still available on the IPFS network.

delete.alert: Are you sure? Deleted files cannot be recovered!
delete.heading: web3.storage says

file_uploader.subheading: You can also upload files using the JS Client Library.
file_uploader.drop_prompt: Drag and drop your files here

blocks.heading: Public Data
blocks.description: All data uploaded to web3.storage is available to anyone who requests it using the correct CID. Do not store any private or sensitive information in an unencrypted form using web3.storage.

blocks.heading: Permanent Data
blocks.description: Deleting files from the web3.storage site’s Files page will remove them from the file listing for your account, but that doesn’t prevent nodes on the decentralized storage network from retaining copies of the data indefinitely. Do not use web3.storage for data that may need to be permanently deleted in the future.
